core.name: Chelonic Unity
core.description:
Leader Bonus:
When Combo Hit Count exceeds 30, Mei and Kiana in the team gain 22% Crit Rate; when Combo Hit Count is below 30, Bronya in the team gains 28% Crit DMG.

subskills.name: Dragon Territory
subskills.description: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 30, Mei and Kiana in the team gain 28% Crit Rate; when Combo Hit Count is below 30, Bronya in the team gains 40% Crit DMG.

core.name: Combo ATK: Lightning Panther
core.description:
Different Six Fists moves can be connected to various Combo ATKs.
Kei: Whipping Sparks: Launches Ki blades dealing 100% ATK of Lightning DMG per hit (additionally deals 100% ATK of Lightning DMG against enemies outside a 4m radius). Within 1s after hitting enemies outside the 4m radius, tap [ATK] or [ULT] to perform Ki: Lightning Pounce, dashing towards the target and dealing 200% ATK of Lightning DMG.
Kei Taranic Talons: Deals 180% ATK of Lightning DMG.
Kei: Six-Sided Shock: Deals 100% + 8%x80% + 200% ATK of Lightning DMG. Use the joystick to set the finishing position.
Kei: Blasting Palm: After unleashing Kei: Six-Sided Shock, tap [ATK] to perform this Combo, dealing 450% ATK of Lightning DMG and knocking back the target. The target additionally deals 200% ATK of Lightning DMG if knocked into a wall.
Kei: Tunneling Blossom: Tap [ULT] during Kei: Six-Sided Shock to perform, dealing 450% ATK of Lightning DMG. Navigate the charging direction with the joystick.

subskills.name: Switch Skill: Rending Dive
subskills.description: When switched in, slam the ground to knock enemies airborne, dealing 400% ATK of Lightning DMG. Shielded enemies take 200% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: QTE: Sundering Drill
subskills.description: QTE: Triggers when an enemy is ignited or slowed. Slams the ground to deal 800% ATK of Lightning DMG. Shielded enemies take 500% ATK of Physical DMG. Procs a 9s Elektrance status.

subskills.name: Dragon's Return
subskills.description: For 5s after switch entry, gains Interrupt, Ignore Interrupt, and 20% DMG Reduction for DMG Received; when exiting the battlefield, applies the same buff to all team members for 5.0s.

subskills.name: Unity Mantra
subskills.description: Team deals 300% ATK of bonus Lightning DMG to enemies when breaking their shields, and deals 30.0% bonus Total DMG for 12.0s. Can be triggered again to reset the duration.

subskills.name: Vajra Mantra
subskills.description: Gains 30.0% Lightning DMG. Kei: Taranic Talons additionally deals 250.0% ATK of Lightning DMG and paralyzes non-paralyzed enemies for 3.00s. Paralyze effect CD: 8s.

subskills.name: Shattering Mantra
subskills.description: Character deals 30.0% bonus Total DMG to shielded enemies. Basic ATK, Combo ATK, Switch Skill, and QTE deal 160.0% bonus damage to shields. Hitting shielded enemies grants Interrupt and Interrupt Resist for 10s.

core.name: Raging Tiamat
core.description:
Consume 50 SP to unleash burst attacks during Combo ATK.
Increases max SP by 50. Hold [ULT] during Kei: Tunneling Blossom or after triggering Time Fracture with Ultimate Evasion to deal 750%x2 ATK of Lightning DMG and gather enemies.

subskills.name: Teravolt Maul
subskills.description: Ultimate deals 50.0% bonus Total DMG and Paralyzes non-Paralyzed enemies for 5.0s.

subskills.name: Conductive Impact
subskills.description: Character deals 45.0% bonus Lightning DMG within 18.0s after entry or Ultimate cast.

core.name: Storm Phoenix
core.description:
Move fast to dodge attacks.
Within 3s after Ultimate Evasion, hit enemies with Kei: Whipping Sparks to proc Ki: Lightning Pounce.
Time Fracture: Ultimate Evasion procs global Time Fracture, slowing all enemies for 3s. CD: 15s.

subskills.name: Fiery Flock
subskills.description: Ultimate Evasion triggers Time Fracture for the game for 1.50s.

subskills.name: Jolting Riposte
subskills.description: The 1st Basic or Combo ATK within 3s after Ultimate Evasion deals 500% ATK of bonus Lightning DMG to the target and nearby enemies, and Paralyzes non-Paralyzed enemies for 4.0s.

core.name: Thunder Wyrm
core.description:
Use the Six Fists for battle.
The Six Fists:
1st Stance: 80% ATK of Physical DMG
2nd Stance: 80% ATK of Physical DMG
3rd Stance: 80% ATK of Physical DMG
4th Stance: 2x100% ATK of Physical DMG
5th Stance: 2x80% ATK of Physical DMG
6th Stance: 150% ATK of Physical DMG

subskills.name: Tigris Elektra
subskills.description: Ki: Lightning Pounce or Ultimate procs 9s of Elektrance status, during which the Valkyrie gains Ignore Interrupt and 50.0% Total DMG Reduction for DMG received, and each sequence of the 6-sequence Basic ATK additionally deals 75.0% ATK of Lightning DMG.

subskills.name: Flux Wyrm
subskills.description: During Elektrance status, each 1st sequence of Basic ATK boosts Total DMG of the next Kei: Six-Sided Shock by 14.0%. 5 stacks max.

subskills.name: Inductive Trauma
subskills.description: During Elektrance status, restores 3.00 SP upon unleashing Kei: Taranic Talons or Kei: Six-Sided Shock; CD: 5s.  Each Taranic Talons hit additionally deals 50.0% ATK of Physical DMG; effect doubles against shielded enemies.
